nodes.text: The Zhar system, located in the Cadavine sector, was home to the planets Zhar and Taivas. The latter was the secret location of the Hidden Temple.
In addition, it was also home to Imperial Outpost 327, the platform that at one time housed the Lambda-class shuttle Tydirium.
The moon of Gall was also located in the Zhar system.
In February 2010, the Taivas system was removed from The Essential Atlas Online Companion.
